title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: Ollama Web UI
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); Markdown, code highlighting, multi-user, model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over the Ollama REST API.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with C# 11 nullable refs, streaming chat, and DI-friendly design.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper (built with Node) that adds conversation history, prompts library, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline helper.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js app, function-calling, GPU metrics, fine-tune adapters.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models; Windows/macOS/Linux builds.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client auto-generated from OpenAPI spec; supports ESM/CJS.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for model announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase of Ollama-based projects.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Plugin that adds in-process vector search (HNSWLib) to Ollama for RAG without external DBs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; includes Rails generator for quick chat scaffolding.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official collection of compose files: CPU, NVIDIA, ROCm, and Open-WebUI stacks.

title: ollama-hackernews discussion
summary: Hacker News thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp, text-generation-webui, and local GPT wrappers.
